Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Your performance at the space station was outstanding.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Well done, Gray Raven.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We were not the only team there.', 3: '7', 4: 'The other teams at the space station...', 5: '8'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'You guys are the MVP this time, no need to be modest.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'They all retreated immediately after your operation ended, all of them are unscathed.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "President, we should move on to today's main topic...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "You're right, there's no time for chit-chat with how urgent the next mission is.", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's the mission?", 3: '19', 4: "There's no rest for the good, huh?", 5: '20'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "It's just exterminating Corrupted as usual.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'You can rest before you arrive.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...What precise calculations.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Well then, Celica, give Gray Raven a simple mission report first.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Yes, President.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Gray Raven, you were able to remove the Punishing Heteromer at the space station last time, but sadly, it was not completely destroyed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "I'm sure you have all noticed... It collided with Watanabe's Fenrir and... plummeted down onto Earth.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Speaking of Watanabe... Is he alright?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "We've lost track of him but we don't have the resources to form a search party.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Back to the main topic today, Gray Raven, your mission this time is to return to Earth and destroy the Hetero-Core from last time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I've also deployed other teams on this mission, and this here, is the area that Gray Raven is responsible for.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Akdilek Commercial Alliance... Wait, this diagram, is a train?', 4: '3'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: "The ACA is a special faction that built their empire on the train. They combined Cosmos Industries' Central Purification Filter technology with a train and transformed it into a mobile Akdilek purification system.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Using heavy nuclear fusion reactor as its energy source, as long as the train keeps moving—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "The filtration system will block out the Punishing Virus. That's how they can live on that train.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But are there still intact railways for the train to operate on? And the resource supplies...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'They already built a massive railway network on the flat Eurasia lands back in the Golden Age—the APUS.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "As for resources, they're merchants, they have their ways.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "So to put it simply, they trade with forces all over the world by rail to ensure their survival. That's how the ACA operates, am I mistaken?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "You're correct. And the main objective of your mission is to find and destroy the Hetero-Core that is currently on the train.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "According to the Science Council's detailed analysis, I'm afraid the Hetero-Core is not just simply the multi-form Punishing Heteromer you saw at the space station.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I've already made a copy of the detailed report... Anyway, the Hetero-Core is a very pesky thing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Even though the ACA still hasn't sent out an official distress signal, we can't just sit here and do nothing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Commandant of Gray Raven, can I entrust this mission to you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Just leave it to me!', 3: '63', 4: "I'm not 100% sure, but...", 5: '64'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Then I'll wait for your good news here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Haha, I didn't know the commandant of Gray Raven could say something like that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "That doesn't sound like what an experienced commandant, someone who gets out of trouble alive every time like yourself, would say. But being careful is never a bad thing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Well then, Gray Raven, please proceed to the designated location by aircraft after maintenance. Chop chop, everyone! Let the mission begin!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'The obstacles on the launch rail have been eliminated. Ready for take-off.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, your orders, please.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gray Raven, move out!', 3: '78', 4: 'Our target, the Hetero-Core on Earth!', 5: '78'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Verifying voice... Fire!', 4: '2'}
